markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Strike;  **Frequency** six times per day;   **Effect** You fire a razor-sharp flechette from the rod of razors. This is a ranged weapon attack that has a range of 100 feet, a reload of 0, and the [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) and [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201) traits. The flechette inflicts 3d8 piercing damage on a hit, and belongs to the [dart](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=6) weapon group. The flechette is an [adamantine](/Rules.aspx?ID=374) weapon.
name: Strike

text: Activate Single ActionStrike; Frequency six times per day; Effect You fire a razor-sharp flechette from the rod of razors. This is a ranged weapon attack that has a range of 100 feet, a reload of 0, and the deadly d10 and volley 30 feet traits. The flechette inflicts 3d8 piercing damage on a hit, and belongs to the dart weapon group. The flechette is an adamantine weapon.
